metadata.title: Qwen-Image-Layered - Free AI image editing and enhancement
metadata.description: Qwen-Image-Layered lets you upload photos, screenshots, or any images to instantly edit, enhance, and transform them with AI-powered tools.
metadata.keywords: qwen image layered, qwen-image-layered, ai image editing, image enhancement, photo editor, ai image tools, image transformation, smart image editing, online photo editor

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Latest news, updates, and tutorials about Qwen-Image-Layered and AI image editing.

sign_modal.sign_in_description: Access your Qwen-Image-Layered account to edit and enhance images with AI

api_keys.title: API Keys
api_keys.tip: Please keep your apikey safe to avoid leaks

my_invites.title: My Invites
my_invites.invite_tip: Invite friends to Qwen-Image-Layered and earn rewards.
my_invites.no_orders: You need a paid plan before inviting others
my_invites.no_affiliates: You're not allowed to invite others, please contact us to apply for permission.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: We'd love to hear what went well or how we can improve the product experience.
feedback.rating_tip: How do you feel about Qwen-Image-Layered?

outfit_generator.title: Qwen-Image-Layered - Edit, enhance, and transform images instantly
outfit_generator.description: Upload photos, screenshots, or any images to edit, enhance, transform, upscale resolution, or refine composition with AI-powered tools.
outfit_generator.upload_placeholder: Click or drag to upload (JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP)
outfit_generator.prompt_placeholder: E.g., 'extend background left and right', 'outpaint sky', 'widen canvas for a banner', 'add room around the subject'...
outfit_generator.insufficient_credits: Insufficient credits. Please recharge to continue expanding images.

errors.no_image: Please upload an image to expand
errors.no_prompt: Please describe how you want to expand the image
errors.invalid_format: Only JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP formats are supported
errors.generation_failed: Image expansion failed, please try again

outfit_gallery.title: Recent expansions
outfit_gallery.description: See the latest images expanded by our tool. Preview before/after and export the result.
outfit_gallery.download_hint: Click to download the expanded image
outfit_gallery.no_outfits: No expansions yet. Upload an image to start expanding!

nano_banana_pro.title: Qwen-Image-Layered - AI Image Generator
nano_banana_pro.description: Generate high-quality images using Qwen-Image-Layered AI model with text-to-image and image-to-image modes

hero.title: Unleash Infinite AI Creativity
hero.subtitle: Transform your imagination into stunning visuals with Qwen-Image-Layered's advanced AI model. Supports both text-to-image and image-to-image creation modes.

generator.prompt_placeholder_image: Describe how to transform the image...
generator.prompt_placeholder_text: Describe the image you want to generate...
generator.generating_submessage: Our Qwen-Image-Layered model is working its magic. This usually takes a few seconds.

my_creations.title: My Creations
my_creations.description: View and manage your AI-generated images - preview and download with one click
my_creations.no_results_message: Try using different keywords or clear the search to view all creations.
my_creations.empty_message: Start using Qwen-Image-Layered to create your first AI-generated image!

errors.upload_reference: Image-to-image mode requires uploading reference images

loading.generation_message: Our Qwen-Image-Layered model is working its magic. This usually takes a few seconds.
loading.upload_message: Please wait while your image is uploaded to the cloud.

intro.title: Qwen Image Layered
intro.description: Decompose a single image into clean, editable layers for design and motion.

upload.title: Upload
upload.subtitle: JPG, PNG, or WebP up to 10MB

prompt.label: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: Describe the layers you want (e.g., subject, props, background)

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.prompt_placeholder: Please enter the prompt to describe the image. (Optional)
advanced.negative_prompt_placeholder: Describe what should be excluded from the layers.
advanced.auto_caption_language: Automatic caption language if no prompt provided, True for EN, False for ZH

results.title: Results
results.subtitle: Layered outputs appear here after decomposition.
results.generating_subtitle: Creating layered assets. This usually takes a few seconds.
results.empty_subtitle: Upload an image and click Decompose! to generate layers.

examples.title: Examples
examples.subtitle: See how a source image breaks into clean layers.

errors.upload_reference: Please upload a reference image first
